attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's down to individual choice to submit expense forms. We think it's shameful that MPs can't be trusted not to abuse their position. We think the salary MPs receive is amply sufficient to exceed their needs. We want an end to expenses for MPs.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
